https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pninqyZVS7zoR6mMDpIk0FlzX3e.jpg When a widower loses his job, he must become a full-time housekeeper and stay-at-home dad. He gains a new perspective as he gets to know his two kids better and struggles with the household chores, but faces losing it all when he gets a job offer in another city. Dad's Home
